code: import{getRandomVerb}from"../../database/verbData";import{getRandomElement}from"../../utils";import{getPerson,getPeople}from"../../database/peopleData";var getQuestion=function getQuestion(){var isPlural=Math.floor(Math.random()*2);var isMale=Math.floor(Math.random()*2);var subject=isPlural?getPeople().firstName:getPerson(isMale).firstName;var verb=getRandomVerb();var object=verb.objects?" ".concat(getRandomElement(verb.objects)):'';var prompt="".concat(subject," can ").concat(verb.infinitive).concat(object,".");var answer="".concat(subject," can't ").concat(verb.infinitive).concat(object,".");return{prompt:prompt,answer:answer};};export default getQuestion;
